block_comment: This line of code is used to assign the value of the register 'outReg' to the output port 'io_DATA_OUT'. The 'assign' keyword in Verilog is used to create combinational logic, tying the right-hand side expression ('outReg' in this case) to the left-hand side wire or port ('io_DATA_OUT' in this case), meaning that any change in the value of 'outReg' will be directly reflected in 'io_DATA_OUT'.
